name: Sense: A Cyberpunk Ghost Story
description: Sense – 不祥的预感: A Cyberpunk Ghost Story is a 2.5D game inspired by Clock Tower and Fatal Frame. Set in the year 2083 in Neo Hong-Kong the story follows Mei-Lin Mak, a young woman with cybernetic eyes pulled into the maelstrom of an unsolved supernatural mystery from centuries past. As she peers...

name: Angry Birds Star Wars HD
description: Angry Birds Star Wars is a video game that is part of the Angry Birds series. It serves as an adaptation of the original trilogy of the Star Wars series.

name: Fragment's Note
description: Fragment's Note is a slice-of-life Visual Novel with a touch of sci-fi. The story centers around two main protagonists and the Yanderes that they have to deal with.

name: Sanzen Sekai Yuugi: Re Multi Universe Myself
description: An otome game developed by Girls Dynamics. This is a remake of the original PC game with new CGs and new scenarios.

name: Koshotengai no Hashihime Noma
description: A highly-acclaimed, psychedelic BL murder-mystery from indie developer ADELTA!

name: Nelke & the Legendary Alchemists: Ateliers of the New World
description:
A spin-off in the Atelier franchise featuring characters from past games.

The game focuses on town building and management.
The main character is not an alchemist, unlike the main games in the franchise, but she can work with them and let them manage an atelier in town making it their own.

Gust...

name: Robotics;Notes Elite
description: Robotics;Notes Elite is a science-fiction visual novel.

name: Waking Violet
description: Waking Violet is a classic 2D top-down puzzle game, but with awesome spells and a unique time rewind mechanic. Playing as Violet, a shy teen with a desire to grow up, you get trapped in a dream you just can't wake up from.

name: Need a packet?
description:
Beep Beep Beep -> Register products -> Take cash -> Go insane
Need a packet is a horror-simulator about supermarket cashier, who is gradually losing her mind from routine work. She starts to feel that the cash register is turning into a medieval tower, while dragons and chimeras are flying around.

name: Brotherhood United
description: Pick your guns, grab your beer and blast your way through hordes of enemies on this run and gun game as a member of the Brotherhood who leaves no friend behind. Show your enemies that no one messes with the Brotherhood. Unite the Brotherhood !

name: Photon Cube
description: Photon Cube is a unique puzzle game which utilizes the properties of light. All you need is a little bit of [knowledge about light] and your [endless imagination]. A cute looking Action Puzzle Game with a hearty serving of challenge! Welcome to the intelligent and magnificent world of Photon Cube!

name: London Detective Mysteria
description:
The evening is as ordinary as they come for London, England as the curtains close on the 19th century. Mist hangs thick, beclouding the radiance of the moon and modest glow of gas lamps. Upon the resounding chime of Big Ben, a new tale of love and adventure like no other begins!

London Detective...

name: One Word by Powgi
description: The word search puzzle with a difference - there's only one word to find! Complete each series of puzzles to reveal the words that complete a quote.

name: Super Destronaut DX
description: Once upon a time, arcade shooter gamers where you have to fend off impending waves of an alien menace, was all the rage, but while retro may be old, it is never forgotten. So, inspired by an arcade classic, Super Destronaut DX is retro space shooter that pits you against an enemy more dreaded than...

name: Fernz Gate
description: Travel to the other side and beyond and find a way back home in a fantasy RPG!

name: Ciel Nosurge Offline: Ushinawareta Hoshi he Sasagu Uta
description: An offline-only version of Ciel noSurge featuring all twelve episode volumes, along with all the talk, and scenario packs that were originally separate downloadable content packs for Ciel noSurge.

name: Monster Hunter Frontier ZZenith
description: Update version of Monster Hunter Frontier Z.

name: Code: Realize - Wintertide Miracles
description: Third game, a second fan disc, in the Code: Realize series, containing after stories for the new routes from Future Blessings. There will also be IF stories, first Christmas for the original cast and an another story.

name: Punch Line: Cheermancy Edition
description: The Rice Exclusive Cheermancy Edition comes with a copy of the game, a collector's box, an artbook, the official soundtrack, Chiranosuke's cat collar and pendant, a Japanese Punch Line logo keychain, and a full-size rubber pigeon head mask!

name: Touhou Soujinengi V: The Genius of Sappheiros
description: Touhou Soujinengi: The Genius of Sappheiros is a fan-made Touhou Project game and a traditional turn-based RPG released at Comiket 78, heavily influenced by traditional console roleplaying games such as the SaGa Series. Despite being an RPG, it follows a traditional Touhou stage-based format, with...

name: Dragonfly Chronicles
description: Dragonfly Chronicles is a 2D Action-Adventure game full of challenge and fun for one single player.

name: Super Life of Pixel
description: Join Pixel as he quests through gaming history, teleporting across the most iconic video game systems of generations past. He’ll have to jump, dodge and play smart if he wants to survive all the traps, puzzles and enemies waiting to take him down at every turn.

name: Tetra's Escape
description: Tetra's Escape is a platforming puzzle-game all about blocks. Blocks named Tetras and it is down to the players to all that they can, to save them and make the most out of their special ability.

name: Your Diary+
description: Your Diary + is a visual novel game that explores the seven ways humans experience happiness in the stories of its seven heroines. What does it mean to be useful to someone? To be loved? To trust someone with your heart? Rediscover the importance of these everyday joys.

name: Battle Rockets
description: What happens when two genres become one? Battle Rockets, that's what happens! In this distinctive "SHMUP Fighter", each player chooses a side–literally! Play as one of twelve "Console-tan" fighters, and battle your friends...or foes! Are you "Head-to-Heady"?

name: Root Letter: Last Answer
description: Root Letter: Last Answer implements a live-action “Drama Mode” that faithfully reproduces every location and character that appears in the game with a cast of 90 actors. By realistically reproducing the beautiful scenery of Shimane Prefecture and the people that live there, the human drama story of...

name: Persona Dancing: Endless Night Collection
description: "3 games in 1! Jam out to all your favorite Persona music with both Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight and Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight in an exclusive collector’s box featuring character art by Shigenori Soejima. Also includes a digital download code for Persona 4: Dancing All Night for the...

name: Jack N' Jill DX
description: In Jack N' Jill DX, players must assume the role of Jack, overcoming many hazards, in a bid to reach Jill, who awaits him at the end of 140 levels, in typical old-school one-button platformer fashion! But, for the players who feel the guy should be the one who needs saving, we absolutely agree and...

name: Ultracore
description:
Hardcore finally awakes.

Except for a few people, no one has ever seen or played this gem. But thanks to friends and our wonderful ‘A-Team’, the original data has finally been recovered. So after nearly 25 years of deep sleep, Hardcore will finally be published in 2019 under the name...

name: Duck Souls
description: Duck Souls is a fast-paced, action platformer about a little duck with an incredible skill to dash and a mission, find all the eggs to save his especies.

name: Cybarian: The Time Travelling Warrior
description: Cybarian the time travelling warrior is a classically inspired arcade action game, with a mixture of modern and retro gaming tropes.

name: Syrup and the Ultimate Sweet
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
description: In a magical town there lives a candy alchemist, Syrup, who one day discovers a candy golem in her basement. Where did she come from? Who could've made her? Go find out! Featuring a memorable cast of colorful characters and 10 unique endings. Your choices affect the story! Will Syrup achieve her...

name: Ephemeral: Fantasy on Dark
description:
Fleeting, yet beautiful. The world of darkness —

The main protagonist, Cloe (name changeable) lived in a secluded town. Surrounded by wire fences, it felt like she was trapped inside a cage.

Zombies were the only residents in that town, and she wasn't the exception. Many took their own life...

name: Awesome Pea
description: Help the greedy Pea to make his way through a string of levels filled with deadly traps and cute but dangerous enemies and collect all the coins to which he can only reach!

name: Gakuen K: Wonderful School Days - V Edition
description: A port that adds new scenes and afterstories.

name: Kiniro no Corda Octave
description: Kiniro no Corda Octave is a spin-off title of the Kiniro no Corda series.

name: Kenka Banchou Otome 2nd Rumble!!
description: The sequel of the original game of Kenka Bancho Otome. It adds a new Character at Shishiku Academy.

name: Romancing SaGa 3
description: The celebrated RPG classic comes West for the first time! Experience a brand-new HD remaster of the legendary 1995 RPG masterpiece introducing optimised graphics, a new dungeon to explore, new scenarios and a new game+ function.

name: Yumeutsutsu Re:Master
description: Yumeutsutsu Re:Master is a story of the various people working at a game development studio.

name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2019
description: A new entry in its Pro Yakyuu Spirits series for PlayStation 4 and PS Vita.

name: Sayonara UmiharaKawase ++
description: Limited edition for the Umihara Kawase series which includes Sayonara Umihara Kawase (2013) and a remaster of the original 1994 super famicom game.

name: Zettai Kaikyuu Gakuen: Eden with Roses and Phantasm
description: A otome game for PC, PS4, Vita, and Switch.

name: Yoshiwara Higanbana: Kuon no Chigiri
description: A port for Switch and Vita.

name: A Winter's Daydream
description: A boy returns to his countryside home after spending half a year in the city, only to discover the unimaginable — his elderly grandmother has transformed into a cute young girl! Hijinks ensue.

name: Panic Palette
description: Panic Palette is an otome game, developed and published by Takuyo, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Sankaku Renai: Love Triangle Trouble
description: Meet Sousuke. He's just your average student, living in a rural town. Ever since his father remarried when he was young, he's been living together with his little sister Nanaru. Together with his childhood friend Maho and their other friends, they have fun geeking out in the Otaku Club.

name: Sengoku Hime 7: Senun Tsuranuku Guren no Ishi
description: Re-enacting the events up to the Siege of Osaka in 1615. There are some new commanders among the 110 that you can control, as well as new outfits for some returning heroines, such as Oda Nobunaga. Since this game takes place over 65 years, the commanders’ sprites will change as they grow.

name: Perils of Baking Refrosted
description: You play as the younger of two brothers, famous for their baking. It's up to you to stop your brother's evil plans as he has given in to a dark artifact.

name: Word Sudoku by Powgi
description: It's Sudoku with words! Place letters in the grid according to normal Sudoku rules and one row or column will spell the word.

name: Drowning
description: Walk in the shoes of this teenage boy who learns to live with his inner demon.

name: Emerald Shores
description: Emerald Shores is a challenging SNES-inspired platformer with a bunch of twists. Level up, take on rewarding sidequests, play a variety of minigames, unlock secret levels, raise a pet monster, and more! Can you liberate the floating island world of Emerald Shores from its captors?

name: Zeroptian Invasion
description: Zeroptian Invasion is a classic shoot 'em up with mechanics from other arcades of the 80's. Travel back in time with this unique pixilated experience with an incredible soundtrack in chiptune.

name: Hana Saki Work Spring!
description: In the midst of spring, the season of first encounters and love, Yuuma was content to waste his time away. However, these dog days began to change with his chance meeting with the mysterious Inori, the Yuki-onna of Suzugaoka Gakuen. Soon after, he was invited by Ayano to the ‘ghost club’, which is...

name: Pushy & Pully in Blockland
description: Cooperative arcade game with a retro feeling. Players will journey through lots of levels with our two hero girls: Pushy and Pully, trying to crush their enemies to clear each stage by pushing blocks and getting power ups by joining blocks together

name: Energy Cycle Edge
description: The main idea is the same: when you activate each cell in the game field, it changes the colors of the cell and any adjacent cells in a straight line. Each cell switches between three different colors, and your task is to make them all match the same color.

name: Mochi Mochi Boy
description: ​Mochi Mochi boy is a puzzle game where you fill all the tiles in a stage to progress. Stretch, twist and warp your way through ​a series of puzzling stages while collecting a cast of cute slimes along the way.

name: Big Dipper
description: They say it's hard to find a place to call your own, but what if such a place was not uniquely yours? What if both of you were not willing to give it up? Big Dipper is a visual novel which tells a romantic story of the circumstances that brought two lovers together one fateful New Year's Eve.

name: Eve: Rebirth Terror
description: Eve: Burst Error originally released in 1995 on PC later ported to Sega Saturn. The long-awaited Eve: Rebirth Terror the start of a new story.

name: Silverio Vendetta: Verse of Orpheus
description: This is not a story of a hero.This is the story of the loser. It is a story in which a man who once escaped fights to recover his star.

name: Silverio Trinity: Beyond the Horizon
description: Situated on the eastern border of the military nation of Adler is the historic city of Praga. It remains a powderkeg despite the official ceasefire between the three nations fighting over the territory and its resources, each of whom was completely different militarily, economically and...

name: Full Kiss
description: Masaharu started at his new school hopeful of getting a girlfriend. A year later, his dream appeared to have been merely a delusion. However, the falling cherry blossoms signal the beginning of a new year and perhaps, a chance for his dream to finally come true.

name: Atari Flashback Classics
description: "The most comprehensive collection of arcade and home console classics. Packed with 150 all-time favorites, rare gems, and inimitable homebrews, Atari Flashback Classics is designed to take advantage of the modern console's unique controls and functionality to bring new life to these iconic Atari...

name: Asdivine Hearts II
description:
Picking up two years after the events of their first adventure, Zack and friends find themselves off on another quest, but this time to save the parallel world of Archelio, which is on the verge of being frozen in ice.

However, after a small mishap prior to arriving at their intended destination,...

name: Vasilis
description: Vasilis is a hand-drawned adventure game, where the player has to overcome a difficult path in order to find the husband of the main character, Peter, lost in the burning and rebellious city. The city has been experiencing revolutionary events for several months already.

name: Haruoto Alice: Gram Snow Drop
description: Seiryou Gakuen is a popular high-ranked school in the seaside city of Minato which prides itself on the latest facilities and student independence. Since a year ago, it has been managed concurrently by the student council and the new entrant's council.

name: Alvastia Chronicles
description: RPG with over 100 companions?! Set out on an adventure in a retro-styled world!After encountering the man who killed their parents ten years prior, Elmia and her brother Alan set out to avenge their deaths as they fight to stem the tide of monsters flooding into the upper world, and restore peace...

name: Pantsu Hunter: Back to the 90s
description: Share a heart-to-heart talk, watch a movie together, take a bath, remove a computer virus, help a girl in a tough spot and—if you're lucky—find the love of your life using the color and pattern of her panties. This game tells the story about a guy looking for love renovated in a nostalgic 80s and...

name: Nanairo Reincarnation
description: Join spirit detective Kagami Makoto and his demon familiars as they hunt down the wandering ghosts disrupting the peace of his small town.

name: Norman's Great Illusion
description: "Norman's Great Illusion" is a 2D pixel art visual novel in which you have to live a year as an engineer at the plant in the face of rising social tensions.

name: Touhou Genso Maroku W: The Devil of Decline
description: The Devil of Decline is a fan-made traditional turn-based RPG based on the Touhou universe and lore. It was developed and published by Strawberry Bose.

name: Necrosphere Deluxe
description: Necrosphere is a (really difficult) bite-sized metroidvania game you control with only two buttons!

name: Revenge of the Bird King
description: Plant seeds, grow guns, be the bird-man you always wished you could be.

name: Pic-a-Pix Pieces
description:
Pic-a-Pix is a picture logic game, sometimes known as Picross, Nonogram or Hanjie, where whimsical pixel-art pictures are created by solving puzzles.

In Pic-a-Pix Pieces, large pictures have been split into a number of smaller pieces. Each piece is a puzzle grid, and by solving them all you’ll...

name: Mecho Wars: Desert Ashes
description:
A classic reborn! Casual, turn-based strategy in a land of fantastical creatures and deadly machines!

Mecho Wars: Desert Ashes is the definitive release of the 2009 turn-based strategy classic, Mecho Wars. Fully remastered in high definition, it features new hand painted art, new visual effects,...

name: Reverie
description: Reverie is an action adventure game set on a fictional island in New Zealand, inspired by the legend of Maui and the Giant Fish where the demigod himself fishes up the North Island with a powerful fishhook.

name: Heroes Trials
description: After the banishing of the previous defender of your island, the community needs new heroes. The long training of siblings Elia and Zoel takes them to the last trials deciding who is the best fit to become the new local guardians. In the finals, they will have to compete against a sleazy couple and...

name: Vasara Collection
description:
For the very first time, highly acclaimed Japanese Arcade Shoot’em Ups: Vasara and Vasara 2 are made available to the whole world via this package: Vasara Collection!

Science Fiction meets History in these arcade classics which take place in an alternate timeline Feudal Japan where technologically...

name: The Walking Dead: Season One - Episode 1: A New Day
description: A New Day is the first episode of the first season of a five-part series based on the AMC TV series and the original The Walking Dead comic book series. The game is set in the United States at the start of a zombie outbreak. It takes place in the original universe but does not rely on characters or...

name: The Walking Dead: Season One - Episode 2: Starved for Help
description: Just like the first episode it consists of eight chapters and it picks up three months after the events of the first one, also taking into account choices that have been made in that earlier episode. This includes statements and decisions Lee has made that characters still remember, as well as...

name: The Walking Dead: Season One - Episode 3: Long Road Ahead
description: Just like the first episode it consists of eight chapters and it picks up after the events of the previous episode. The group is still at the Travelier Motel and goes by with the supplies from the car they found, along with scavenging trips from Kenny and Lee to the city.

name: The Walking Dead: Season One - Episode 4: Around Every Corner
description: Just like the first episode it consists of eight chapters and it picks up after the events of the previous episode. The train the group managed to get going arrives at Savannah, the place Clementine believes her parents are.

name: The Walking Dead: Season One - Episode 5: No Time Left
description: Just like the first episode it consists of eight chapters and it picks up after the events of the previous episode. Clem disappeared and Lee is in contact with her through the walkie-talkie, but she is not alone.

name: Daggerhood
description:
Every man should have a skill and for Vincent S. Daggerhood, that skill was thieving. Quick with his hands, there was no loot he couldn’t plunder and no treasure chest he couldn’t escape with.

For Daggerhood, life was good, until come that fateful day he was finally caught and in the name of...

name: The Princess, the Stray Cat, and Matters of the Heart
description: Once upon a time, after his mother passed away, a boy called Nora felt all alone in the world. He spent every day with his unique and kind hearted friends until one fateful day, he had a chance encounter with a princess from the Netherworld.

name: ScourgeBringer
genre: Fighting, Shooter, Platform, Adventure, Indie, Arcade
description: ScourgeBringer is a fast-paced free-moving roguelite platformer. Help Kyhra to explore the unknown and to slash her way through the ancient machines guarding the seal of her past, and maybe the redemption of humanity.

name: Himno
description: Himno is a peaceful, 2D platformer game with an infinite number of beautiful procedurally generated maps. Take a breath, and relax.

name: Synergia
description: Synergia is a yuri thriller visual novel that takes place in a cyberpunk future, wrapped up in a beautifully unique, vibrant neon aesthetic. At the end of the world, sometimes love is the ultimate crime.

name: Block-a-Pix Deluxe
description: Reveal the picture by dividing the grid into smaller rectangular blocks to create a colorful mosaic. Each block must contain one clue number, indicating the size and color of the block to be painted.

name: Nurse Love Syndrome
description: Meet cheerful Kaori Sawai, fresh out of nursing school, as she joins Yurigahama Hospital. Surviving a near death experience as a child left her with a desire to become a nurse and "healing hands" that let her relieve pain in patients just by touching them.

name: Frane: Dragons' Odyssey
description: An odyssey to the world below! Set out for in search of a missing girl and venture out in a fantasy action RPG!

name: Foxyland 2
description: Get ready to plunge into an exciting new platforming adventure with Foxy!

name: Task Force Kampas
description:
Task Force Kampas is inspired by the Golden Age of japanese shmups, and adds new mechanics, randomly generated levels and handcrafted bosses. It is an endless loop: you can finish it, but also find the way to continue past the ending and get the highest score!

Space shooters were never that punchy...

name: Shinigami to Shoujo
description: Shinigami to Shoujo is a visual novel by Takuyo.

name: Thunder Paw
description: This is a pixel-art platformer with five different levels and different scenarios, as well as a ton of weapons to be used to annihilate each level boss.

name: Crossovers by Powgi
description: Crossovers are little crosswords with only one letter missing. Once found, the missing letters can be rearranged to spell the answer to to a cryptic clue.

name: New Game! The Challenge Stage!
description:
"The Challenge Stage is a training adventure game based on the popular anime. The player is Aoba Suzukaze, who is tasked with creating add-on downloadable content for a hurriedly decided RPG epic.

During Training Parts, your more experienced co-workers teach you and you learn skills. Your training...

name: Super Robot Wars V
description: Super Robot Wars V is a tactical role-playing game developed by B.B. Studio and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment for the PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita. Released as part of Super Robot Wars' 25th anniversary, it is the eighth standalone entry to the series since Super Robot Wars NEO,...

name: Saviors of Sapphire Wings
description:
A first-person RPG dungeon crawler from Experience Inc. for the PlayStation Vita in Japan. 
It is a remake of Entaku no Seito (Students of Round), which was originally released for PC in 2010 before being ported with some changes to Xbox 360 in 2011 and PSP in 2012. 
 
"In Saviors of Sapphire...

name: God of War II
description: A remaster of God of War II, an action-adventure hack-and-slash video game developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment (SCE). The game is rooted in Greek mythology and unfolds in ancient Greece, revolving around the theme of vengeance. The protagonist, Kratos, is...

name: God of War
description: A remaster of God of War, an action-adventure hack-and-slash video game developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment (SCE). Loosely inspired by Greek mythology, it unfolds in ancient Greece with vengeance as its central theme. The player takes on the role of Kratos,...

name: Gnosia
description: Gnosia is a Sci-Fi Social Deduction RPG in which you will engage in discussion with a variety of unique characters, with the aim of identifying the Gnosia among the group. Players will have to use what information they can gather during the discussions to ascertain whom they think is Gnosia and...

name: Red Bow
description: If you were given another chance, would you take it? Or leave it in the hands of a little girl? Play as Roh, a young girl stuck in a bizarre nightmare of dark and eerie creatures.

name: Mixups by POWGI
description: The mixed-up anagram puzzle, where three connected words are hidden among a jumble of letters.

name: Bucket Knight
description: Even knights still have to pay taxes, loans and alimony. Help the brave knight in his sacred mission to find the Holy Grail (and then sell it). Explore dungeons, slay enemies, avoid traps, stay alive and get rich!

name: Neon Junctions
description: A first-person puzzle-platformer imbued with a synthwave and 80s atmosphere.

name: Pic-a-Pix Classic
description:
Pic-a-Pix is a picture logic game, sometimes known as Picross, Nonogram or Hanjie, where whimsical pixel-art pictures are created by solving puzzles.

Pic-a-Pix Classic features 150 traditional single-colour puzzles, ranging from introductory 5x5 puzzles to challenging 30x20 grids.

name: Basha Tarneeb
description: Basha Tarneeb brings the popular 4-player trick-taking card game to the minis platform. Partner up with the game AI and play against the rival team in this game of wit and strategy. The game puts the player in an atmosphere of playing with old friends, with rich arabesque visuals that stem from...

name: Word Wheel by Powgi
description: The classic word wheel puzzle goes digital! Find as many words as you can from the letters shown, always using the middle letter!

name: The House in Fata Morgana: Dreams of the Revenants Edition
description: A gothic suspense tale set in a cursed mansion. 'The House in Fata Morgana' is a full-length visual novel spanning nearly a millennium that deals in tragedy, human nature, and insanity.

name: Paint Park Plus
description: Draw, doodle and color anything you like with your PlayStationVita system and Paint Park Plus! Play solo or with your friends via Ad-Hoc mode, add a personal touch to photographs taken with your PS Vita, and Tweet your artwork for the world to see.

name: Bouncy Bullets
description: In a world where the sky is blue and water is pink, with icebergs replaced by floating ice-creams, Bouncy Bullets is a colourfully vibrant first-person shooter that will task players to traverse wonderful terrains, in a bid to reach the portal that awaits them at the end of every level!

name: Puss in Combat Boots
description:
This is a world where cat people exist, and consider humans as their gods whose wishes must be fulfilled.

Our protagonist is cat princess Tama, who’s been arranged to marry her cousin Koutarou in a marriage ceremony. The ceremony carried out without incident, until a human came from of the sky...

name: Mekabolt
description: Use your trusty Mekabolt device to manipulate robots, solve a variety of puzzling levels and obtain batteries to fix the robots!

name: Kawaii Deathu Desu
genre: Fighting, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie, Arcade
description: In Kawaii Deathu Desu, supernatural beings find themselves incarnated as cute japanese idols! Pick a supernatural idol and beat the hell out of - no pun intended - as many overzealous fans as you can in this addictive beat'em up as you work your way up to claim the throne of the underworld!

name: Attack of the Toy Tanks
genre: Shooter, Racing, Simulator, Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Arcade
description: War is coming whether you’re ready for it or not soldier! In Attack of the Toy Tanks, across the game’s 60 levels in the main campaign, players must take control of the provided vehicle of war and battle it out across different arenas and be the last tank standing.

name: Grass Cutter: Mutated Lawns
genre: Music, Platform, Puzzle, Simulator, Indie, Arcade
description:
Grass Cutter is a game about cutting mutating lawns, that requires lightning-speed response and great logical thinking. Here every level is a challenging puzzle.

The goal is to cut the grass. Very simple, but only at first glance… Grass Cutter calls for focus and commitment. Just one blink of an...

name: Moe Moe World War II-3
description: What is Moe Moe World War II - 3? Moe Moe World War II - 3 is the part 3 of Moe Moe World War series. The main characters are weapons that play by lovely girls who are World War II weapons. The game types of Moe Moe World War II - 3 are blended simulation and adventure.

name: Knightin'+
description: Join brave sir Lootalot on his epic quest in this little Zelda-lite adventure. Explore and fight your way through the dangerous dungeons filled with traps, puzzles and magical artifacts. And, of course, show the evil bosses who is the real boss here.

name: Spirit Hunter: NG
description: While its predecessor, Spirit Hunter: Death Mark, found its spirits in distinct, horrifying locales, Spirit Hunter: NG weaves fear seamlessly into the mundane. Face down monsters in quiet residential streets, neighborhood parks, and even the protagonist’s own home. Be careful—terror lurks behind...

name: Contraptions
description: Contraptions is a physics based puzzle game with a fun cartoony look. How many steps does it take to change a light bulb? If your answer is 10 or more, then you are ready for "Contraptions" - a game where the goal is to fix whacky contraptions that perform simple tasks in indirect and convoluted...

name: Witchcrafty
description: Witchcrafty is a metroidvania platformer with magical action gameplay, exploration of a weird world, and adorable pixel art graphics. Help the little witch solve the mystery of strange events in the Kingdom, and defeat enemies with fire, lightning, and ice magic.

name: Color Slayer
description: Race and slash your way forward in this color-based arcade game. Push your reflexes as you evade or slice color-coded enemies.

name: Divine Grimoire
description: In Divine Grimoire, players summon units fight in highly tactical, turn-based battles. Tense, strategic battles focusing around card-decks provide a heretofore unseen level of intrigue in this Fantasy RPG. With a robust single-player mode, architecture system, the game also stays true to its roots...

name: Super Wiloo Demake
description:
Wiloo and Agatha need to rescue their dog from the clutches of Dr.ETvaldo!

Roll, fly, jump, and shoot your way across a variety of different platforming levels using unique power ups to reach the end of the level. Can you defeat all 5 bosses and rescue your buddy?

With 3 different difficulties,...

name: Boku to Nurse no Kenshuu Nisshi
description: A visual novel about a hospital love story between a medical intern and a nurse who would go above her duties to take care of him.

name: Emma: Lost in Memories
description: Emma is a 2D puzzle platformer that revolves around a potent central mechanic: all the platforms and walls start disappearing when the player touches them. This creates a series of challenges around this idea. Also, the player only needs to focus on jumping and reacting to its environment as he...

name: Kaleidoscope of Phantasm Prison
description: A project penned by Ryukishi07 and illustrated by Inoue Itaru. The scriptwriter describes the story as "a terrifying tale of how these innocent cute girls will have everything taken from them with no mercy".

name: Kaleidoscope of Phantasm Prison: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition of the game currently has 4 bonus items.

Phantasm Object, an official setting document collection
- Includes comments on character design and the heroine's expressions, comments from the cast, staff members and Ryukishi07. Also includes the Drama CD script.

Voice Drama CD,...

name: Wordsweeper by Powgi
description: A crossword puzzle solved using logic and deduction.

name: Gravity Duck
description: Have you ever wanted to be rich? What if you could become rich and control gravity!?This duck can with your help!

name: Hatsuyuki Sakura
description:
The console version of the 2012 visual novel Hatsuyuki Sakura, released for PlayStation Vita in 2017 and Playstation 4 in 2019.
Part of the developers Four Seasons series of visual novels that also had manga and light novel adaptions based on them.

name: Traditional Tactics
description:
Original version of Traditional Tactics for PlayStation 4 and Vita in Japan.

The game was updated to Traditional Tactics Be alongside the release of the Nintendo Switch version, Traditional Tactics Ne.

name: Wurroom
description: Wurroom is an interactive art experience, disguised as an exploration adventure game, relieved through the story of a Hand, lost in unknown worlds and unclaimed realities. Also, the game is free!

name: Master Magistrate
description: Solve crimes and pass judgment with a colorful cast of samurai, detectives, inventors, and brigands in a Japan on the edge of modernization. A visual novel detective game set in a town where the cherry trees bloom all year round.

name: Habroxia
description: Blast your way through a myriad of extra terrestrial incursions in this arcade-style scrolling shooter! Pilot the ship Habroxia through 15 levels featuring intense boss fights, rescue missions, shifting perspectives and untold surprises. Customize your ship to enhance your abilities, unlock the...

name: Sousei no Onmyouji
description: Sousei no Onmyouji tells the story of two talented exorcists who are destined to become the "Twin Star Exorcists" and the prophesised parents of the Miko - the reincarnation of Abe no Seimei who will cleanse the world of all impurities.

name: Damascus Gear: Operation Osaka
description: The goal of 'Damascus Gear Operation Osaka' is to repay the hero's inherited debt before the due date. The hero together with his Operator will participate in the Arena as a Ranker, aiming for the prize money to repay his debt. It will not be a story for the history books, but a battle for...

name: Diabolik Lovers: Lost Eden
description: New Diabolik Lovers game with a murder mystery theme.

name: Diabolik Lovers: Lunatic Parade
description: Fandisc for Diabolik Lovers: Dark Fate.

name: Memories Off: Innocent Fille for Dearest
description: Features happy endings for all the characters in Innocent Fille while also maintaning the bittersweet atmosphere of the MemOff series. Also includes cameos by several characters from previous Memories Off games.

name: Fifty Words by Powgi
description: A brand new word search puzzle from Powgi. This time there’s no grid, no list of words to find and no wrong letters!

name: Active Neurons
description:
Active Neurons is a game that trains the player in spatial logical thinking.
By controlling the power of thought, you must charge the neurons. The more the neurons are charged, the healthier the brain becomes. The healthier the brain becomes, the more of a fully-fledged life the person will...

name: Super Box Land Demake
description: Pick from two characters to help solve moving box puzzles in order to advance to the next stage!

name: Hakuoki Yuugiroku Taishitachi no Daienkai
description: Compilation of three spin-off Hakuoki games in one package, two of which are remasters from PlayStation Portable, Hakuoki Yuugiroku and Hakuoki Yuugiroku 2 Matsuribayashi to Taishitachi, with the third being original to this release. While going through story episodes you get to play various mini...

name: Tic-Tac-Letters by POWGI
description: Tic-Tac-Letters is a single player logic puzzle based on tic-tac-toe.

name: Wizards of Brandel
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Adventure
description: The young wizard Darius loses his house after he fails to make a loan repayment, and ends up living for free in the house of a wanted sorcerer! As he meets a female swordsman who has absolutely no sense of direction, and a plant girl who shrivels up immediately if she doesn't drink enough water,...

name: SteamWorld Heist: Hatbox - Hatful Eight + 2
description: A lively bunch of hats that will surprise you with a life of their own. They’re cheaper than coffee, and certainly taste better!

name: Deep Space Rush
description:
Join the DeTeam! A top-secret security force that protects the scientific space stations from virus contaminations!

Take on randomly generated levels to save everyone before they all get infected. Avoid traps and monsters to survive the sweep!

Are you ready to protect the space stations from...

name: Nippon Pro Mahjong: Renmei Kounin Motto 20-bai! Mahjgong ga Tsuyoku naru Houhou - Hatsu Chuukyuu-sha-hen
Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society
description: From the creators of Labyrinth of Refrain: Coven of Dusk comes a new chapter in the dungeon-exploring adventure filled with charm and mystery! Summoned by the magnificent Madame Marta, you are but a wandering spirit awaiting your next command. With the help of Eureka, Madame Marta’s assistant, and...

name: Explosive Jake
description: Explosive Jake - classic arсade game. Not only humans afraid of dark and deep dungeons. Our hero - a little skeleton with unhealthy crave of explosions, which trying to escape from castle dungeons. Help him to avoid enemies and explode his way out.

name: Basha Baloot
description: Basha Baloot brings the popular trick-taking card game to the minis platform. Partner up with the game AI and play against the rival team in this game of wit and strategy. The game puts the player in an atmosphere of playing with old friends, with rich arabesque visuals that stem from traditional...

name: Basha Trix
description: Play through four exciting kingdoms of trix on the minis platform. This 4-player game puts the player in an atmosphere of playing with old friends, with rich arabesque visuals that stem from traditional game boards and tables from the Arabian region.

name: Basha Card Game Collection
description:
A compilation of the following games :

- Basha Baloot
- Basha Tarneeb
- Basha Trix

name: The Princess, the Stray Cat, and Matters of the Heart 2
description: The Princess, the Stray Cat, and Matters of the Heart 2 is a heart-warming romantic comedy visual novel featuring 5 new heroines and 4 heroines from the first game.

name: Lazr: A Clothformer
description: A new era of physics based platforming is about to begin. Play as fusion powered killer android Lazr, facing off against rogue AI and mega-corporations in Alpha City One.

name: Awesome Pea 2
description:
Greedy Pea is back in game! Dark dungeons, deadly traps, everything is green, a lot of gold everywhere!

Awesome Pea 2 - next chapter of classic platformer game. Greedy Pea is back in game! Now even more dark dungeons, deadly traps and gold!

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 1: All That Remains
description: With the loss of Lee Everett and almost everyone else she could call a friend bearing down on her mind, Clementine continues to make the best of a life that gives new meaning to pain. With only memories and a pack on her back, what will Clementine find next?

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 2: A House Divided
description: After gaining new friends (and enemies), Clementine has found her way into the lives of more survivors. Now, she fights for her life against an army of the dead with one wounded companion. How will she beat this new threat?

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 3: In Harm's Way
description: After reuniting with her old friend, Kenny, Clementine is now prisoner to a man with the intention of preparing mankind's next generation for survival, through any means necessary. Can she and her friends escape?

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 4: Amid the Ruins
description: With the group scattered amidst a swarm of monsters sent from hell, Clementine's only goal is finding her friends and keeping them safe. Now, armed with only a hatchet, can she gather all of her friends before trouble finds them?

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 5: No Going Back
description: The birth of Rebecca's son and subsequent death of the baby's mother has started a new battle for survival which promises to not end quietly. Through the harshest weather she has seen thus far, can Clementine protect the group's newest member and keep everyone she cares about alive?

name: Little Busters! Converted Edition
description:
Since its humble beginnings as a PC game, the "Little Busters!" visual novel has continued to evolve. In the past decade, we have seen spin-off games and console adaptations, as well as the release of comic, novel, and anime adaptations.

It's easy to see why; the underlying theme of friendship in...

name: Random Heroes: Gold Edition
description:
The Earth is being invaded by terrifying aliens! It's up to you and a bunch of random heroes to save the day and stop the invasion! Shoot and jump your way through over 108 levels to stop the alien menace and bring peace to the planet. Will you be able to survive?
Collect cold hard cash to upgrade...

name: Link-a-Pix Deluxe
description:
Link-a-Pix is a clue-linking puzzle where every grid has a picture hidden inside. The aim is to reveal the picture by painting paths to link the clues.

Connect pairs of clues which have the same colour and number. The number shows the length of the line which will connect them.

Link-a-Pix can...

name: Reed Remastered
description:
Collect cubes to save the virtual world!

Help Reed collect information cubes in order to recalibrate the world and reboot the system. Avoid enemies and traps along the way to successfully move onto the next world!

The virtual world now depends entirely on you and your platforming skills!

name: Ken ga Kimi for V
description: Vita edition adds an additional after story for each character for all four of their endings with CGs, new CGs, sub character lines in the extra section, new OP&ED songs.

name: Ken ga Kimi: Momoyo Tsuzuri
description: Ken ga Kimi is Japanese legend ADV and is highly recommended since released at Japan. Ken ga Kimi: Momoyo Tsuzuri is the FD of the original game and it has 100 stories included.

name: Koezaru ha Akai Hana: Koi ha Tsuki ni Michibikareru
description:
A port for Vita.

A land where women are scarce due to a fatal disease.

Naala, a girl who lives in the southern country Ruse, lost her only blood relative at a young age when her mother was stolen away by the Northern country Nasula.

The one who supported her was her adored "older brother" and...

name: Shinsouban Heart no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World
description:
Shinsouban Heart no Kuni no Alice ~Wonderful Wonder World~ is the 2nd remake of Heart no Kuni no Alice. Remade with Fujimaru Mamenosuke's art (Diamond artist).
This game also had an English release on phones.

name: Genji Koi Emaki
description: Genji Koi Emaki was released in 2015 for the PSVita.

There’s just one flaw: a Giftia can live only 81,920 hours (about nine years and four months) before their memories and...

description: Twin Breaker stars Colin Moriarty and Chris Ray Gun (of the Sacred Symbols Podcast) in their first video game adventure. A new take on the brick-breaker genre with a story written by Colin Moriarty!

name: Ikemen Sengoku: Toki wo Kakeru Koi Aratanaru Deai

Sakaki Mio is a completely ordinary high school student.

...However, perhaps having been influenced by her grandmother who had raised her, Mio can be somewhat old-fashioned. As a result, she's often isolated by girls of the same generation. She becomes too focused on others' feelings, and becomes...

Duck Souls+ is a fast-paced, action platformer about a little duck with an incredible skill to dash and a mission, find all the eggs to save his species.

Duck Souls+ is set in a cute and deadly fantasy world, where many traps will rip your wings off...

description:
Breeder Homegrown is a short horror game about a family dealing with a strange creature over several generations. You will encounter some puzzles but the game relies mostly on atmosphere, music and dialogues.

The whole experience takes about 40-90 minutes depending on how much you want to...

description:
Run and gun your way to the next level!
It’s time for a new point of view to the classic arcade shooter experience! In Super Destronaut Land Wars, it’s up to you take shoot down enemies and collect points to move on to the next level!

Inspired by arcade classics, this new arcade experience mixes a...

The main new area of Episode 4 is the Planet Earth of the year 2028 AD. Set in a...

name: Phantasy Star Online 2: Episode5 Heroes
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure

A battle with the [Monster Species] summoned by the sword flower "Effimera" will take place!! "PSO2" first advanced class "Hero" added! This is an expert...

description: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki FC Evolution is a remake of The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki. The remake brought many changes to visuals, presentation and gameplay including updated art, music and new voice acting.

description: A small child falls into the Underground, where monsters have long been banished by humans and are hunting every human that they find. The player controls the child as they try to make it back to the Surface through hostile environments, all the while engaging with a turn-based combat system with...

3000 years in the future, after a terrible war has polluted the worlds atmosphere.

A young girl named Eve has lived in an underground shelter for a long time with only a robot AI for companionship.

which continues from the normal end and after stories for the main cast.

A combined remake of the original game + Izayoiki that includes the additional content from the collectors edition.

Full Voice, Redrawn Stills, more than 40 new stills added,
Adds Love ED after stories and a DLC route for Fujiwara no Yasuhira.

Kamigami no Asobi InFinite, abbreviated as KamiAso IF, is a Japanese otome game published by Broccoli (company). It was released in Japan on April 21, 2016 for the PlayStation Portable and PlayStation Vita.

InFinite shares the same premise as the first game, with new routes and new endings for the...

She then discovers her father is trying to find her a rich husband at the party, but she doesn't want to have that fate. Suddenly, some rogues break into her place and start trashing the place. There are more than 30 new events and 30 new stills...

He had strived to follow in her footsteps, but she was always a couple of steps ahead. Reunited with his childhood friend Mio and subject to...

The title also features 'Extra Missions' with guests from across the Macross series. Players will be able to use Variable Fighters with three different...

At this boarding school, students not only learn basic education but are also taught how to be dignified. This year is especially unique since royalty from the small Scandinavian country of Sortilège was invited...

"BURIED STARS" is a new mystery Communication x Survival x Adventure game developed by Team Largo and LINE Games Corporation.

BURIED STARS is an adventure game that takes place at a collapse site of a live audition show. The trapped survivors communicate with each other, and through social media,...

On July 18, 2013, a massive update was released in the Japanese version of Dynasty Warriors Online, changing the name of 真・三國無双 Online to 真・三國無双 Online Z.

This update adds the new feature of "Weapon Swapping" similar to Dynasty Warriors 7. Characters and soldiers have been remodeled with their...

name: Clannad
description: A port for Clannad for consoles and portable devices developed by PROTOTYPE, in which the game is presented in 16:9 resolution and contains 5.1 surround sound in some releases.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Onikakushi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original first chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Watanagashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original second chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tatarigoroshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original first chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Himatsubushi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original fifth chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Meakashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the first arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tsumihoroboshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the second arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Minagoroshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the third arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Matsuribayashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the fourth and final arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Saikoroshi-hen
description: A port of the epilogue to the main story of Higurashi originally included in Rei for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Taraimawashi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc originally included in Matsuri, which acts as a bad ending when the player does not make choices that would lead them to Onikakushi, Watanagashi, or Tatarigoroshi for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tsukiotoshi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc originally included in Matsuri that serves as an alternate version of Tatarigoroshi where Keiichi, Shion, and Rena team up to save Satoko from her uncle for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Someutsushi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc and the first in the Advanced Story saga originally included in Kizuna Volume I, partially adapted from the manga-exclusive arc Onisarashi, for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Alternative Hirukowashi-hen
description: A port of the alternative version of Hirukowashi-hen originally included in Kizuna Volume II, which contains several changes to its original version in Kai, namely the addition and removal of certain characters and the removal of references to plot details not yet revealed, for modern consoles in...

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Kageboushi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc and the second in the Advanced Story saga originally included in Kizuna Volume I, partially adapted from the manga-exclusive arc Onisarashi, for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Yoigoshi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc included in Kizuna Volume III based on the manga arc of the same name and features several changes, namely the addition of a new character, Miyuki Sorimachi, for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tokihogushi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc and the third in the Advanced Story saga that centers on Tomoe Minai investigating a murder case with ties to Rena Ryuugu for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Kotohogushi-hen
description: An extra arc originally included in Kizuna IV that functions as a prequel to the entire series for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Miotsukushi-hen Omote
description: A port of the original alternative ending that is included in Matsuri for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Miotsukushi-hen Ura
description: A port of the additional content included in Kizuna Volume 4's Miotsukushi-hen split into its chapter for modern consoles in widescreen,

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Hajisarashi-hen
description: An extra arc about Keiichi and the Club going to have fun at a pool that was initially included in Sui but later brought to Hou.

name: Candy Crisis
description: Candy Crisis is an exciting combination of pure action and puzzle gaming! The game features twelve unique stages, complete with its own character and individual technique. Also, you can pair off against a friend, and even specify a handicap so that both players are evenly matched. And if you don't...

name: Charade Maniacs: Limited Edition
description:
Limited edition of Charade Maniacs. Comes with:
- Charade Maniacs game

name: Helldivers: Defenders Pack
description:
Helldiver Defenders are the unmovable objects of humanity, capable of holding their ground in any situation. They have a bulkier look and a helmet reminiscent of the knights of Old Earth and used to double as riot police before humanity unified properly.

Support Helldivers are much loved by their squad mates and bring both firepower and medical aid to any squad they join. Wearing the classic grey cape with a black cross they project an aura of capable concern for fellow humans.

• The Support Uniform, a cosmetic helmet, armor, and cape.

Increased rank cap from 25 to 27.
6 new trophies.
New environment: Volcanic planets, full of dangers.
New Bug type: The Bug Impaler
New Cyborg...

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Shouseiroku
description: Nobunaga's Ambition (Nobunaga no Yabou) is a turn-based strategy video game series first released in Japan in 1983. It is a series of loosely adapted historical simulations produced by the Japanese video game developer Koei. It features a predominately Japanese voice track though English dubs...

name: Sangoku Hime: Sangoku Ransei - Haruten no Saihai
description: There can only be one dragon (emperor), however heaven sent a 3-headed dragon to the world. Soon an uprising called the Yellow Turban Rebellion happened, marking the beginning of a battle for supremacy. This is known as the period of the Three Kingdoms.

name: Air
description: An expanded port of the Japanese visual novel AIR that includes a visual novel version of Yuuichi Suzumoto's short story First Sky Chapter as a prequel to the Summer story arc about how Kanna and Uraha met.

name: Whoa Dave!
description: Whoa Dave! is an arcade action game. The action is single screen and the goal is a high score which is increased by collecting coins dropped by defeated enemies. Enemies that make it to the bottom of the stage bounce up from the lava and evolve.

name: Kud Wafter: Converted Edition
description: An expanded port of Kud Wafter for consoles, which removes the sexual content and adds additional story events and visuals.

name: Machi: Unmei no Kousaten - Tokubetsu-hen

description: The demo version of Danganronpa V3. Having a completely original story from the full game, it features characters from previous Danganronpa games having to solve a murder case together.

name: Final Fantasy IV
description:
A port of Final Fantasy IV for PlayStation that adds an opening and ending FMV cutscene as well as some gameplay improvements such as the ability to run in dungeons and towns.

It is largely based on the original Japanese release for the Super Famicom but includes some of the changes made in the...

description: Whilst mainly the same as the other versions of Rayman Origins, the PlayStation Vita version adds in something in the form of Relics.

Ocha no ma Battle is a collection of a lot of mini games (use a screwdriver, imitate the fighter movements, climb trees with a monkey, dive to grab treasures, run a race, stop before a cliff, etc.) that can be played for one or two players at the same time.

The game features 16 different...

description: SillyTower is a physics based game where you must build the highest possible tower!

In Honer of Minecon 2015, claim this free skin pack ONLY available from July 1st too July 16th.

This DLC is expired and cannot be purchased anymore

Girls Are Weird is a short dating sim. You can't win, so it's just like talking to a real girl.

Created for Pirate Kart 2 in 2 hours

An application released for PS Vita with some minigames and a reconstruction of Yakuza 0's arena.
Some Arcade games were released as DLCs, such as Super Monkey Ball: Banana Splitz.

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku Ishin! Muryou App
description: An application for PlayStation Vita based on Yakuza: Ishin! released only in Japan. The game features some side contents from the main game such as farming, cooking, gambling, cards and fighting in dungeons.

name: Utawarerumono Trilogy Set
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Visual Novel
description: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen, Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception and Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth together as the “Utawarerumono Trilogy Set”.

name: Top Classic Plaigarized
description: Welcome to Top Classic Plaigarized (the misspelling is intentional). This game was heavily influenced by "Top Neon Rush". Avoid obstacles and shrink when you need to (some obstacles can only be avoided by shrinking).

description: DLC for Persona 4 Dancing All Night which allows the player to play a special versione of Heaven with Hatsune Miku as a dancer.

name: Zero Escape: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors
description:
The first game in the Zero Escape series, originally made as a standalone title "Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors". The Zero Escape rebranding and alternative cover of the game were released alongside its sequel in the "Zero Escape: The Nonary Games".

This version features updated artwork,...

name: Ancient Villa
description:
A famous archaeologist and her penguin companion went to a medieval castle-villa to inspect it in all details. Three months have already passed yet we have not received any news from her. Will she return with new discoveries?

A 3D Puzzle/Exploration Homebrew for PSVITA Originally made for TWG25...

name: Stella of The End: Diary of a Faint Hope
description:
Doujin game adapting the official Stella of the End after story book.

The after story unfolds in the form of a diary, set in a post-apocalyptic world. The human protagonist, Rafe, had a very miserable childhood. Everything changed when he met the courier, Philia.

name: Tales of Hearts R: Infinite Evolve
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description: Included in the first print copies (pre-order) of Tales of Hearts R on the Vita and available with a digital release for a limited time. It's a minigame rendered in the same graphic style as Tales of Hearts – the DS version, it is a game separate from the main story with an exponentially increasing...

name: The House in Fata Morgana: Reincarnation
description: The fully voiced "Reincarnation" sequel featuring the central cast members reincarnated in the present day.

name: The LEGO Movie Video Game
description: The 3DS, Vita and Mobile versions of The LEGO Movie Video Game features utterly different level layouts and gameplay to the main version of the game, such as a system where you go back to the last checkpoint and losing progress when you respawn instead of respawning on the spot.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Navi’s Quest
description: Zelda Navi's Quest is an Open Source fan made 2D Zelda game that chronologically takes place after the ROTH trilogy, a series of fan made Zelda games made by Vincent Jouillat. The gameplay lies in the ability to play as both Link and Navi, the player being able to heal and survey the area with...

It will have new modules (edited too, so they can fit PDF style), actual redesigned charts with technical zones*, and chance time events for almost all songs. There will also be new menu graphics, new sprites, you will be...

description: The protagonist Fukami Suguha visits the historic graves of the forty-seven Akou rounin on New Year's Day, but suddenly blacks out while observing the solar eclipse. He wakes up in the body of an Edo period samurai with the same name and face. Suguha is forced to adjust to life in the year 1701 as...

description:
Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Fortress is an action strategy game, developed and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2015.

Create your own Mobile Suit team and assault the enemy fortress. There will be many playing features such as creating your own fortress and defending...

description: In this sequel to Bento Fujiyama Tamagoyaki, players are still in the bento shop trade, but this time as a new set of protagonists. This time around, players take control of Nama-ham and Yaki-udon, a real-world eccentric two-member freelance idol band, as they take on restauranteuring. Like in the...

PURIFIED is a single-player, third-person shooter with high octane action and neo-retro style, currently in development for the PS Vita and PC.
Inspired by the games and comics of the 90s and early 00s, it aims to be both a love letter to, and commentary on, the era of giant shoulder armor and...

description: Taking inspiration from Rengoku for the PSP, Armored Core and Blame!, ABYSS is a third person shooter duel game featuring randomly generated guns and enemies. How deep can you descend into the ABYSS?
